trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
Start-Transcript
Start-Transcript
SYNOPSIS
Creates a record of all or part of a Windows PowerShell session in a text file.
trans-unit.target: 在文本文件中创建 Windows PowerShell 会话的所有或部分记录。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
ByPath (Default)
ByLiteralPath
DESCRIPTION
The Start-Transcript cmdlet creates a record of all or part of a Windows PowerShell session in a text file.
trans-unit.target: Start-Transcript cmdlet 可在文本文件中创建 Windows PowerShell 会话的所有或部分记录。

trans-unit.source: The transcript includes all command that the user types and all output that appears on the console.
trans-unit.target: 该脚本包括用户键入的所有命令和在控制台上显示的所有输出。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
This command starts a transcript in the default file location.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将启动默认文件位置中的脚本。

trans-unit.source: This command starts a transcript in the Transcript0.txt file in C:\transcripts.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将启动 C:\transcripts 的 Transcript0.txt 文件中的脚本。

trans-unit.source: The NoClobber parameter prevents any existing files from being overwritten.
trans-unit.target: NoClobber 参数可防止覆盖任何现有文件。

trans-unit.source: If the Transcript0.txt file already exists, the command fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Transcript0.txt 文件已存在，该命令将失败。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
-Append
Adds the new transcript to the end of an existing file.
trans-unit.target: 将新脚本添加到现有文件的末尾。

trans-unit.source: Use the Path parameter to specify the file.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Path 参数指定文件。

trans-unit.source: -Force
Allows the cmdlet to append the transcript to an existing read-only file.
trans-unit.target: 允许 cmdlet 将该脚本追加到现有的只读文件。

trans-unit.source: When used on a read-only file, the cmdlet changes the file permission to read-write.
trans-unit.target: 在只读文件上使用时，该 cmdlet 会将文件权限更改为读写。

trans-unit.source: Even using the Force parameter, the cmdlet cannot override security restrictions.
trans-unit.target: 即使使用 Force 参数，该 cmdlet 也无法覆盖安全限制。

trans-unit.source: -NoClobber
Will not overwrite (replace the contents) of an existing file.
trans-unit.target: 将不会覆盖现有文件（替换其内容）。

trans-unit.source: By default, if a transcript file exists in the specified path, Start-Transcript overwrites the file without warning.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，如果脚本文件存在于指定的路径中，则 Start-Transcript 将覆盖该文件而不发出警告。

trans-unit.source: -Path
Specifies a location for the transcript file.
Enter a path to a .txt file.
Wildcards are not permitted.
If you do not specify a path, Start-Transcript uses the path in the value of the $Transcript global variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定路径，则 Start-Transcript 将使用 $Transcript 全局变量的值中的路径。

trans-unit.source: If you have not created this variable, Start-Transcript stores the transcripts in the $Home\My Documents directory as \PowerShell_transcript.\<time-stamp\>.txt files.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未创建此变量，Start-transcript 将聊天记录存储在 $Home\My Documents 目录作为 \PowerShell_transcript。\<时间戳\>.txt 文件。

trans-unit.source: If any of the directories in the path do not exist, the command fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果路径中不存在任何目录，该命令将失败。

trans-unit.source: -LiteralPath
Specifies a location for the transcript file.
Unlike **Path**, the value of the **LiteralPath** parameter is used exactly as it is typed.
trans-unit.target: 与不同 **路径**, ，值 **LiteralPath** 完全按照其键入使用参数。

trans-unit.source: No characters are interpreted as wildcards.
trans-unit.target: 不会将任何字符解释为通配符。

trans-unit.source: If the path includes escape characters, enclose it in single quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果路径包括转义符，请将其括在单引号中。

trans-unit.source: Single quotation marks tell Windows PowerShell not to interpret any characters as escape sequences.
trans-unit.target: 单引号会告知 Windows PowerShell 不要将所有字符都解释为转义序列。

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 显示如果运行 cmdlet 则会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmdlet 不会运行。显示在 cmdlet 运行时，会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
CommonParameters

This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
None
You cannot pipe objects to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 不能通过管道将对象传递给此 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
System.String
Start-Transcript returns a string that contains a confirmation message and the path to the output file.
trans-unit.target: Start-Transcript 将返回一个字符串，包含一条确认消息和输出文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
To stop a transcript, use the Stop-Transcript cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要停止脚本，请使用 Stop-Transcript cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: To record an entire session, add the Start-Transcript command to your profile.
trans-unit.target: 若要记录整个会话，请将 Start-Transcript 命令添加到配置文件中。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Profiles.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Profiles。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
Stop-Transcript
